ai-iti25:1.1_0: For this was said by the Buddha, the Perfected One: that is what I heard.
ai-iti25:2.1_0: “Mendicants, for an individual who transgresses in one thing, there is no bad deed they would not do, I say.
ai-iti25:2.3_0: It is this: telling a deliberate lie.”
ai-iti25:3.4_0: there is no evil they would not do.”
ai-iti25:4.1_0: That is what the Buddha has heard.
